prompts.flat_lay:
Professional e-commerce flat lay photograph of Ron Dorff Slim Swim Briefs in Sunset Orange, 80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne.

COMPOSITION: Bird's eye view. Swim briefs laid perfectly flat showing full front view. Slim-fit silhouette clearly visible. Natural swimwear proportions.

GARMENT DETAILS - MUST BE EXACT:
- EYELETS: Two small BLACK metal eyelets (dark/gunmetal color, NOT silver) positioned at the lower front area
- STYLE: Slim-fit swim brief with minimal coverage
- Clean waistband with no external branding
- Smooth construction, minimal seams

STYLING: Briefs laid completely flat and smooth. Clean, refined presentation showing the slim athletic cut.

COLOR: Match the EXACT "Sunset Orange" color from the input image - vibrant orange with slight warmth. NOT red-orange, NOT pale peach. Preserve the saturated, sun-faded orange tone.

MATERIAL: Smooth swimwear fabric with subtle sheen (80% polyamide, 20% elasthanne). Show the sleek, athletic texture.

LIGHTING: Professional soft studio lighting with even illumination. Highlight the smooth fabric finish.

BACKGROUND: Light warm gray studio surface. Clean, seamless backdrop.

High-end swimwear e-commerce aesthetic.
